name: Zig Zag Ball
overview: Zig Zag Ball is a wacky alien golf game that features 2 Games modes: Story mode & VS mode. The story mode features 4 different character to choose from. The game features different stages and also a shop where the player can buy special items that will help him during the stages or improve his health, to buy those items he will need to get starts playing the different stages. Gameplay: During each stage there are light doors and the player have to stroke his pet through all of them to elevate the alien that is over the stage hole, so that way he can throw his pet to the hole to complete each stage. The player's heart decrease with each stroke and when it reachs zero is game over.
